Articles.Content:
I made an F-15, and I shot the wing off mid-flight!

![FFjVJs3.png](http://i.imgur.com/FFjVJs3.png)

![LrIz908.png](http://i.imgur.com/LrIz908.png)

![PVaaljB.png](http://i.imgur.com/PVaaljB.png)

![LehK1dG.png](http://i.imgur.com/LehK1dG.png)

CRAFT: [https://www./?ndyazn9e6lcvypx](https://www./?ndyazn9e6lcvypx)
Nice work! THAT, in the current areodynamics and physics engine, is VERY impressive. +rep!

Nice replica! A suggestion for the nose cone is to use fairings, that you then use the rotate tool to make it look more like the real one's nosecone. It's textures are not the best, but for the shapes fairings are my best bet. I suggest you also place avionics inside it, as on the real one (I think) the radar and other systems are mounted in the nose cone, so it gets more realistic then.
